definition: ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: They all know of, Xuan, that being like alike object of duck pear is a Xuan.
sentences.chinese: 他们都懂的，埙，那个像鸭梨一样的东西是埙。

sentences.english: They all know of, Xuan, that being like alike object of duck pear is a Xuan.
sentences.chinese: 他们都懂的，埙，那个像鸭梨一样的东西是埙。

definition: xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
guqin or qin, a long zither with seven strings, plucked with the fingers
sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
pipa, Chinese lute, with 4 strings, a large pear-shaped body and a fretted fingerboard
huqin/family of Chinese two-stringed fiddles, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and bamboo bow with horsehair bowstring
